title: Understand Column Hiding
text: In spreadsheets, hiding columns is used primarily when you want to make your data presentation cleaner by concealing certain details.

title: Purpose of Hiding
text: Consider situations where information is sensitive or irrelevant to your presentation—it might be helpful to hide such data.

title: Data Presentation Needs
text: When presenting a dataset, you sometimes want your audience to focus only on the most relevant data points, which can be achieved by hiding certain columns.
